alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:31PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORM OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ROOSEVELT, SOUTHEASTERN DE BACA, NORTHEASTERN CHAVES AND SOUTHEASTERN CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM MDT... At 830 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from near Clovis to near Dora to near Kenna to 18 miles north of Elkins. Movement was of the outflow boundary was to the south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Portales, Texico, Elida, Dora, Causey, Milnesand, Elkins, Arch and Kenna. This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 119 and 125. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 387 and 396. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Roosevelt County
